Plot: An Italian woman conducts a desperate search for her husband, a soldier considered missing in action in Russia - like fifty thousand others during WWII.
Title: Sunflower
Writer: Tonino Guerra (story), Cesare Zavattini (story), Giorgi Mdivani (in collaboration with)
Actors: Sophia Loren, Marcello Mastroianni, Lyudmila Saveleva, Galina Andreeva
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
